languages.text: The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.
languages.original_text: Хтонос восстанавливается и получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и наносит на +10% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется. Цель получает штраф −50% к Ближнему Бою, Дальнему Бою, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}. Если существо становится целью этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} второй раз, оно умирает.

traits.locale_text: Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}, and +10% damage until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to BS, WS, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this ability for the second time, they die.

The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.

The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.

Эффект суммируется. Цель получает штраф −50% к Ближнему Бою, Дальнему Бою, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}. Если существо становится целью этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} второй раз, оно умирает.
languages.original_text: The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.

languages.text: チャトノス・ペインエンジンは癒やされ、戦闘終了時まで+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、+10%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を得る。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}はスタックする。ターゲットは射撃技能、近接攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}に−50%の永久{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負う。その生物が2回目にこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の対象になった場合、その生物は死ぬ。
languages.original_text: The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.

traits.locale_text: チャトノス・ペインエンジンは癒やされ、戦闘終了時まで10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}、10％のダメージを得る。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}はスタックする。ターゲットはBS、WS、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}に50％の永久{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負う。その生物が2回目にこのアビリティの対象になった場合、その生物は死ぬ。

チャトノス・ペインエンジンは癒やされ、戦闘終了時まで+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、+10%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を得る。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}はスタックする。ターゲットは射撃技能、近接攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}に−50%の永久{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負う。その生物が2回目にこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の対象になった場合、その生物は死ぬ。

languages.text: 奇托诺斯痛苦引擎恢复生命值，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高10点，造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高10%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。目标的弹道技能、武器技能、{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}永久降低50%。如果该生物被此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}再次击中，则会立即死亡。
languages.original_text: The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.

traits.locale_text: 奇托诺斯痛苦引擎恢复生命值，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高10点，造成的所有伤害提高10%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}目标的弹道技能、武器技能、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}眼前降低50%。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}如果该生物被此能力再次击中，则会立即死亡。

奇托诺斯痛苦引擎恢复生命值，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高10点，造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高10%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。目标的弹道技能、武器技能、{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}永久降低50%。如果该生物被此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}再次击中，则会立即死亡。

languages.text: El Motor del dolor Chtonos se cura y gana +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} hasta el final del combate. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} es acumulativa. El objetivo sufre una penalización permanente del −50 % a su Habilidad de proyectiles, Habilidad de armas, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}. Si la criatura es objetivo de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} una segunda vez, morirá.
languages.original_text: The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.

traits.locale_text: El Motor del dolor Chtonos se cura y gana +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} y +10 % de daño hasta el final del combate. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} es acumulativa. El objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} permanente del -50 % a su HP, HA, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}. Si la criatura es objetivo de la capacidad una segunda vez, morirá.

languages.text: Chtonos-Schmerzmaschine heilt und erhält bis zum Ende des Kampfes +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} ist stapelbar. Das Ziel erleidet einen dauerhaften Abzug von -50 % auf Ballistik-Fähigkeit, Waffenfähigkeit, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Wird die Kreatur zum zweiten Mal von dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} anvisiert, stirbt sie.
languages.original_text: The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.

traits.locale_text: Chtonos-Schmerzmaschine heilt und erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g} und +10 % Schaden bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} addiert sich. Das Ziel erleidet einen dauerhaften {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -50 % auf BF, WF, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}. Wird die Kreatur zum zweiten Mal von dieser Fähigkeit anvisiert, stirbt sie.

Chtonos-Schmerzmaschine heilt und erhält bis zum Ende des Kampfes +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} ist stapelbar. Das Ziel erleidet einen dauerhaften {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -50 % auf Ballistik-Fähigkeit, Waffenfähigkeit, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Wird die Kreatur zum zweiten Mal von dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} anvisiert, stirbt sie.

languages.text: La machine de tourment Chtonos soigne et bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g}, +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable. La cible subit une pénalité permanente de Compétence balistique, de Compétence d'arme, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de −50 %. Si la créature est ciblée pour la deuxième fois par cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, elle meurt.
languages.original_text: The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.

traits.locale_text: La Machine de Tourment Chtonos soigne et bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g}, +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}CA{/g} et +10 % de dégâts jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable. La cible subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} permanente de CB, de CA, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} de -50 %. Si la créature est ciblée pour la deuxième fois par cette capacité, elle meurt.

languages.text: -Ktonos Acı Motoru, iyileşir ve +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} ile +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} kazanır. Ayrıca vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} da +%10 artar. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} üst üste birikebilir. Hedef; Balistik Yetenek, Silah Yeteneği, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliklerine −%50 kalıcı ceza puanı alır. Yaratık, ikinci kez bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetin{/g} hedefi olursa ölür.
languages.original_text: The Chtonos Pain Engine heals and gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks. The target suffers a −50% permanent penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. If the creature is targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the second time, they die.
